name: @smile_identity/web-page
description: Self Hosted Integration for Smile Identity on the Web

scripts.build: npm run instrument && npm run copy
scripts.build:dist: mkdir dist && echo src/*.js | xargs -n1 sh -c 'npx terser $1 --mangle --compress --output dist/$(basename $1 .js).min.js' argv0
scripts.copy: cp src/*.html build && cp -r libs build && cp index.html build
scripts.copy:dist: cp src/*.js dist ** cp src/*,html} dist && cp -r libs dist

author: tams sokari <tams@smileidentity.com>
